texts.Message_200014_04: I see... When would be a good time for you? I wanted to ask you out.
texts.Message_200014_05: Let me know when you're free. I wanted to ask you out.
texts.Message_200014_06: I'll be free as soon as I finish eating this.
texts.Message_200014_07: What do you have for me, Proxy? I'm on Sixth Street now.
texts.Message_200014_08: Yeah, I'll meet you after I finish eating this.
texts.Message_200014_09: I'll come to you. Where are you?
texts.Message_200014_10: Are you grabbing a bite at the noodle shop?
texts.Message_200014_12: What...? Hold on, I'm on my way.
texts.Message_200014_13: Wait, you can't eat that! I'm coming to you right now!

texts.Message_20002102: Another peaceful day at the Cunning Hares.
texts.Message_20002103: So I've got some free time.
texts.Message_20002104: Ah, but I'm chatting with you.
texts.Message_20002105: So maybe I'm not that free after all...
texts.Option02_20002106: Let's go out on a date!
texts.Message_20002108: A date... does that mean picking a date, a time, a place, and then we meet? Sure.
texts.Message_20002109: Is there anywhere you want to go?
texts.Option01_20002114: {M#I want to hang out with you}{F#Let's hang out~}
texts.Option02_20002114: {M#Was thinking, maybe we could hang out?}{F#Chatting with you! Wanna hang out?~}
texts.Message_20002117: Where do you want to go?
texts.Message_20002120: That's exactly what I was thinking.
texts.Message_20002121: I was also planning to go to Bardic Needle.
texts.Message_20002124: The weather today is perfect for listening to some music.
texts.Message_20002125: Let's pick out some discs together then.
texts.Message_20002126: I'm free, just let me know when~
texts.Message_20002128: I asked a friend to pick up some old civilization videotapes that have gone out of circulation for me.
texts.Message_20002129: Each one is linked to an urban legend.
texts.Message_20002130: There's "Dark Monday," so unsettling it saps your will to live.
texts.Message_20002131: Then there's "Fatal Ringtone," with the office worker crawling out of the TV when you watch it.
texts.Message_20002132: And "Recordings of a Former Life" where it's said your past life could take over your body.
texts.Option02_20002134: Meh, but I'll watch it with you
texts.Message_20002136: Thank you. If you're afraid of urban legends and paranormal events like Nicole, I'll protect you.
texts.Message_20002138: When are you free? I'll stop by the video store.

texts.Message_200019_07: Why did you send it three times?
texts.Message_200019_08: Nicole said if someone sends you a short message, you should reply three times to show respect.
texts.Message_200019_09: But... I don't think it worked
texts.Message_200019_11: Appreciate the respect. Let's hang out!
texts.Message_200019_13: Is there anywhere you want to go?
texts.Message_200019_15: But I'm a bit busy today.
texts.Message_200019_17: Nvm. I just talked to Nicole. Shifted my work to tomorrow.
texts.Message_200019_19: Sure your job's okay with this?
texts.Message_200019_20: Moving things around for me? I'm honored!
texts.Message_200019_21: It's nothing, just some small stuff
texts.Message_200019_22: Hanging with you is more important than those tasks
texts.Message_200019_24: Let's go for a stroll on Sixth Street!
texts.Message_200019_28: Nicole asked me to help her with something on Sixth Street when I have time...
texts.Message_200019_30: It's something fun we could do together
texts.Message_200019_35: Then I'll see you near the payphone on Sixth Street
texts.Message_200019_39: Thanks for the reminder. I just remembered something.
texts.Message_200019_40: I might need your help with it...
texts.Message_200019_45: Just let me know when, I'll wait for you at the newsstand.

texts.Message_200312_02: Please send me a message if you see this
texts.Message_200312_05: No work at the Cunning Hares today
texts.Message_200312_11: Where do you want to go? I'm whatever~
texts.Message_200312_15: Huh? You're the one who asked me to send you "a message"
texts.Message_200312_18: {M#I'll take you to a fun place!}{F#I miss you so much, Nekomata!}
texts.Message_200312_19: Sure, I'm bored out of my mind anyway!
texts.Message_200312_21: Where do you feel like going?
texts.Message_200312_25: I was just thinking about going!
texts.Message_200312_35: The newsstand? Sure, sounds good to me!
texts.Message_200312_36: And I know a spot where the local cats hang out...
texts.Message_200312_39: Not mine! It's where all the stray cats from Sixth Street chill.
texts.Message_200312_41: Then let's head to the newsstand. I'll bring some treats!
texts.Message_200312_42: When's good for you? Let me know, and I'll see you then!

texts.Message_200314_05: Wait, you're not a thief, are you? Give that phone back to its rightful owner!
texts.Message_200314_06: Or are you just... trying to be all cute and stuff?
texts.Message_200314_07: I was just trying to be cute. I want to hang out with you.
texts.Message_200314_08: I'm not the owner, but I want to hang out with you.
texts.Message_200314_10: I got a screenshot of that!
texts.Message_200314_11: Next time you deny being cute, I'm using this against you. Hmhmhm!
texts.Message_200314_13: Caught you! I got a screenshot of that!
texts.Message_200314_14: You're the one who sent that meow meow!
texts.Message_200314_15: Alright. Where do you want to go?
texts.Message_200314_18: I'm so bored... Even my tail is starting to rust!
texts.Message_200314_19: {M#Should we find something to do?}{F#Let's find something fun to do!}
texts.Message_200314_22: First, I gotta check with Nicole before I bail!
texts.Message_200314_23: Work's chill at Cunning Hares, but I can't just walk out~
texts.Message_200314_24: Hope Nicole doesn't cut my pay for this...
texts.Message_200314_25: Alright, it's done. Where are we going?
texts.Message_200314_27: Let's head to Box Galaxy and kill some time!
texts.Message_200314_29: I was actually thinking of going there too!
texts.Message_200314_35: Alright then! You pick a time!
texts.Message_200314_39: I'm down for some gacha games, too.
texts.Message_200314_40: Let's meet at the most visible landmark on Sixth Street!
texts.Message_200314_46: Yeah, it's a popular meetup spot
texts.Message_200314_47: You pick the time! And don't be late

texts.Message_200116_01: R U there? R U there? R U there?
texts.Message_200116_02: Got a minute? I've got an invitation for you.
texts.Message_200116_03: I'm here, I'm here, I'm here
texts.Message_200116_04: What's up, why are you spamming me?
texts.Message_200116_05: I thought it was a debt collector for a sec!
texts.Message_200116_06: You bet! I AM a debt collector... JK! Come hang out!
texts.Message_200116_08: Hmph! I knew you weren't the debt collecting type!
texts.Message_200116_09: Where do you wanna go? I'm down for anything~
texts.Message_200116_10: Sounds good! Where do you wanna go?
texts.Message_200116_13: Are you taking me out for a fancy dinner? Or is it serious business?
texts.Message_200116_14: I just wanted to ask you out...
texts.Message_200116_15: You think too much, just wanted to hang out with you is all
texts.Message_200116_16: Oh okay, why didn't you say so earlier! Where to?
texts.Message_200116_17: Oh, okay... Sure! Where are we going?
texts.Message_200116_19: Let's go for a stroll on Sixth Street!
texts.Message_200116_21: My daily divination says I have fantastic luck today!
texts.Message_200116_22: Can't waste a lucky day like this. Since you want to go to Box Galaxy too...
texts.Message_200116_23: Let's hit up the gacha machines there!
texts.Message_200116_24: Who knows, my good luck might rub off on you!
texts.Message_200116_28: Please, share your good luck with me!
texts.Message_200116_29: Really? Then we'll hit the jackpot today!
texts.Message_200116_31: Let's meet near Box Galaxy! You pick the time!
texts.Message_200116_34: You know that vending machine on Sixth Street?
texts.Message_200116_35: I heard that thing is always glitching, toss in your coins and no drink comes out
texts.Message_200116_36: If you give it a good kick, sometimes stuff just falls out...
texts.Message_200116_37: It's such an inconvenience for the good people of Sixth Street! I was thinking of taking a closer look at it.
texts.Message_200116_38: How about we go there together?
texts.Message_200116_40: You just want the free stuff, don't you?
texts.Message_200116_41: Alright! I knew you'd be interested!
texts.Message_200116_42: Wdym! I'm just curious! You must be curious about this mysterious vending machine too, surely~
texts.Message_200116_43: Let's meet near the vending machine on Sixth Street! You pick the time!

texts.Message_200118_04: Are you being chased by a debt collector, too?
texts.Message_200118_05: But wait, I thought you guys were loaded?
texts.Message_200118_06: I just wanted to ask you out.
texts.Message_200118_07: I just wanted to meet you.
texts.Message_200118_08: Oh okay, why didn't you say so earlier
texts.Message_200118_09: Have you been studying the art of smooth talking? Share some tips with me.
texts.Message_200118_10: Where do you want to go? Nothing too pricey, I hope.
texts.Message_200118_15: I'd like to invite you to hang out with me.
texts.Message_200118_16: {M#I'd like to request you to hang out with me.}{F#Let's hang out~}
texts.Message_200118_17: Okay, I shall honor your request. Where are we going?
texts.Message_200118_18: Sure thing. I'll give you a 20% discount on this commission.
texts.Message_200118_19: Haha, just kidding. I'm down. Where do you wanna go?
texts.Message_200118_20: Let's go to Coff Cafe on Sixth Street!
texts.Message_200118_22: The coffee shop on Sixth Street?
texts.Message_200118_23: You know, I was actually planning to go there today.
texts.Message_200118_25: I had a feeling you'd want to go there.
texts.Message_200118_27: Really? How did you know? Teach me your ways.
texts.Message_200118_28: Hmmm, I'm glad we're on the same page! Let's meet there then.
texts.Message_200118_29: Why don't you pick the time? I'm down whenever.
texts.Message_200116_21: My daily divination says I have fantastic luck today!
texts.Message_200116_22: Can't waste a lucky day like this. Since you want to go to Box Galaxy too...
texts.Message_200116_23: Let's hit up the gacha machines there!
texts.Message_200116_24: Who knows, my good luck might rub off on you!
texts.Message_200116_28: Please, share your good luck with me!
texts.Message_200116_29: Really? Then we'll hit the jackpot today!
texts.Message_200116_31: Let's meet near Box Galaxy! You pick the time!

texts.Message_200217_04: Perhaps we can do something together?
texts.Message_200217_05: Although I've no idea what to do...
texts.Message_200217_07: {M#Wanna go somewhere together?}{F#Let's go out and have fun!}
texts.Message_200217_10: Is there anywhere you want to go?
texts.Message_200217_13: You're asking me out! I'm flattered.
texts.Message_200217_14: {M#Is it because you have a place in mind that you're too embarrassed to go alone?}{F#Is there somewhere you've been dying to check out but didn't want to go alone?}
texts.Message_200217_16: {M#I just wanted to hang out.}{F#I just wanted to hang out and have a good time with you!}
texts.Message_200217_17: Huh? Guess I read that wrong.
texts.Message_200217_18: Wow, you really think highly of me, Manager! That's touching!
texts.Message_200217_19: Where would you like to go? I'm down for anything!
texts.Message_200217_23: And it's perfect for taking pictures.
texts.Message_200217_24: Speaking of which, I've been practicing some awesome Starlight Knight poses lately, and I need someone to take some pictures of me
texts.Message_200217_25: I heard you're a pro at taking photos, so I was hoping you'd help me out...
texts.Message_200217_27: I'll make sure you look just like the Starlight Knight himself!
texts.Message_200217_29: Aww... Thank you so much, Manager!
texts.Message_200217_30: Let's meet near Box Galaxy, then.
texts.Message_200217_31: When are you available? I'm free whenever!
texts.Message_200217_34: I was planning to play a few rounds, too!
texts.Message_200217_36: But just a heads up, my skills have really leveled up lately.
texts.Message_200217_41: When are we meeting? The sooner, the better!

texts.Message_200219_03: Huh? Is it a special day today?
texts.Message_200219_05: It's the day we'll hang out and have fun.
texts.Message_200219_06: It's the day we meet up and have a great time.
texts.Message_200219_08: Huh? We made plans? I totally forgot...
texts.Message_200219_09: It's my fault! I'll update my memory module later... Thanks for reminding me, Manager!
texts.Message_200219_11: Where do you wanna go? I'm game for anything!
texts.Message_200219_13: If you're asking, I'm definitely free!
texts.Message_200219_17: {M#Since you're free, let's hang out.}{F#Since you're free, wanna hang out?}
texts.Message_200219_24: Oh, it's been a while since I've been there.
texts.Message_200219_25: Perfect, I've been wanting to check out some CDs!
texts.Message_200219_28: Let's go, we'll see who has better taste in music
texts.Message_200219_29: Ofc! You know me best, Manager!
texts.Message_200219_31: Just pick a time that works for you. Let's meet at Bardic Needle.
texts.Message_200217_34: I was planning to play a few rounds, too!
texts.Message_200217_36: But just a heads up, my skills have really leveled up lately.
texts.Message_200217_41: When are we meeting? The sooner, the better!

texts.Message_4010006_08: Not now, maybe later... But where are we going?
texts.Message_4010006_09: If I say I'm not busy, you might have doubts about Belobog Industries operations...
texts.Message_4010006_10: I wouldn't, I just wanted to ask you to hang out

texts.Message_4010006_12: I just finished organizing my schedule and realized I'm actually free today

texts.Message_4010006_27: It tastes great once you're used to it
texts.Message_4010006_28: Want to give it a try?
texts.Message_4010006_31: When that time comes, I'll be counting on you to recommend your favorite flavor!

texts.Message_4010007_01: I've not had much on recently
texts.Message_4010007_04: Are you trying to make me jealous? Whatever, it's fine
texts.Message_4010007_05: No, I just wanted to ask you to hang out
texts.Message_4010007_06: I wanted to hang out with you
texts.Message_4010007_07: Yeah, I haven't seen you in a while
texts.Message_4010007_10: How are you doing? If there's a commission you need help with, I'm here any time
texts.Message_4010007_12: Let's go for a walk together
texts.Message_4010007_13: So it's not business after all
texts.Message_4010007_14: I'm actually quite happy you're not just contacting me for official business
texts.Message_4010007_15: Is there anywhere you want to go?
texts.Message_4010007_22: It's nothing. You'll find out once we meet
texts.Message_4010007_24: Wait for me at the video store then
texts.Message_4010007_25: What time works for you? I don't want to interfere with your business
texts.Message_4010007_27: No thoughts...? Well, as weird as it sounds, would you come with me to Public Security?
texts.Message_4010007_28: If there's anything you want to do, we can go together!
texts.Message_4010007_29: I do have some stuff to do there
texts.Message_4010007_30: I can go see a friend
texts.Message_4010007_31: Perfect, I've got some business to deal with, too
texts.Message_4010007_32: I want to meet my friend in Public Security!
texts.Message_4010007_34: Let's meet at the Public Security parking lot, then. You pick the time

texts.Option01_401100301: Today's perfect for some outdoor exercises.
texts.Option02_401100301: Are you off work now, Anton?
texts.Message_401100303: Every day is perfect for some outdoor exercises!
texts.Message_401100304: But today, in particular, is a wonderful day to hang out with friends outside!
texts.Message_401100307: Any specific place you want to go, Proxy?

texts.Message_401100309: Bardic Needle? I was thinking about that place, too.
texts.Message_401100310: Trust me. That music store is on fire!
texts.Option02_401100311: How can a music store be "on fire"?
texts.Message_401100312: You'll understand once you come, Proxy.
texts.Message_401100314: Let's meet up at Bardic Needle. You pick a time!
texts.Message_401100315: Actually, I was planning to swing by the newsstand for something urgent too.
texts.Message_401100316: It's super urgent! It's about my bro.
texts.Message_401100318: Yeah, I'll fill you in when we meet up.
texts.Message_401100319: What time works best for you?
texts.Message_401100320: I'm having a rare day off today.
texts.Message_401100321: Although a day off for me is rare, I don't really feel like taking it.
texts.Message_401100323: "If you keep working, Anton, we'll get fined for violating labor laws."
texts.Option01_401100324: Since you're on vacation, you should be out having a blast.
texts.Option02_401100324: Since you're free, don't waste your time by staying at home.
texts.Message_401100325: You sure know me well, Proxy!
texts.Message_401100326: I'm not the type who can stay still at home.
texts.Message_401100327: So, where do you want to go, then?

texts.Message_401100413: But I'm having trouble deciding what to get.
texts.Option02_401100414: Lucky for you, I'm a pro at picking gifts.
texts.Message_401100415: I'm so touched... You're so dependable, Proxy.
texts.Message_401100416: Sorry for the inconvenience! You can choose the time!
texts.Message_401100417: I've got a brilliant idea! Since the weather's so lovely today...
texts.Message_401100418: Are you feeling the urge to get some exercise?

texts.Message_401100423: It's too late to back out now, Proxy!
texts.Message_401100425: You know the way to the construction site, so come here whenever you like. I'll be waiting for you!
texts.Message_401100426: I'm having a rare day off today.

texts.Message_401201002: Roger, this is Ben Bigger. Over!
texts.Message_401201003: Phaethon, go ahead! You in urgent need of help?
texts.Message_401201004: The emergency engineering team is ready and waiting!
texts.Option01_401201005: What a shame. I just wanted to meet up with you
texts.Option02_401201005: I'm putting out an urgent commission... for Ben Bigger to come meet up with me!
texts.Message_401201006: Maintaining client relationships is usually a job for Anton and the President
texts.Message_401201007: But {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Proxy is no ordinary client, of course
texts.Option01_401201009: Shall we go listen to some CDs at Elfy's music store?
texts.Option02_401201009: There's a new series of surprise boxes at the gadget store
texts.Message_401201010: I'll level with you, I'm in the Bardic Needles most weekends
texts.Message_401201011: Last time, I ordered a really rare record from Miss Elfy
texts.Message_401201012: If I'd known, I would've invited you to join me, {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Proxy.
texts.Option01_401201013: I want to see Elfy's playlist
texts.Option02_401201013: I'd like to see your playlist
texts.Message_401201015: Once I'm at Sixth Street, I'll knock on the door of your video store
texts.Message_401201017: The Box Galaxy on Sixth Street?
texts.Message_401201018: I remember now. The president mentioned a doll to me a couple of days ago
texts.Message_401201019: "It's fuzzy and soft to the touch, just like Ben's mane"
texts.Message_401201020: Perhaps they have one for sale?
texts.Message_401201022: Let me see... There's a bus to Sixth Street leaving in five minutes
texts.Message_401201024: It's rare to see you take it upon yourself to visit me, {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Proxy
texts.Message_401201025: As always, I'm surrounded by ledgers and reports
texts.Message_401201026: Have you brought any good news to save me?
texts.Option01_401201027: Does hanging out with me count as good news?
texts.Option02_401201027: Would it be any help if I invited you out?
texts.Message_401201028: Maintaining close communication with work partners is all part of the job
texts.Message_401201029: Such being the case, I'm sure if I shelve Grace's funding application for the time being
texts.Message_401201031: Have you got any particular destination in mind, {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Proxy?

texts.Option01_401201301: I've got an expense that needs reimbursing
texts.Message_401201103: {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Proxy, did the president and the others damage your equipment during in-Hollow operations? Don't tell me it was Eous?
texts.Message_401201104: Please send the list of damaged equipment plus any cost details to my company email... I am terribly sorry...
texts.Option01_401201105: So gullible. Wanna come out for a walk with me?
texts.Option02_401201105: I'm just kidding. Are you free? Wanna come out?
texts.Message_401201108: Please don't joke around about that kind of stuff. I'm already in danger of putting the books in the red this month as it is
texts.Message_401201109: However, what there's plenty of is TIME to spend with you, {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Proxy. Where are we going?
texts.Message_401201126: Give me a second to just staple in the last invoice
texts.Option01_401201128: Wanna go for a walk with me?
texts.Message_401201130: Let me just check the weather forecast and my meeting schedule
texts.Option01_401201303: Let's go to the cinema! There's a new movie out
texts.Message_401201304: I think the last time I went to the cinema was with Anton. He dragged me out to watch a re-release of Final Punch under the guise of "team building"
texts.Message_401201305: I was left with the distinct impression... that niche movies are niche for a reason
texts.Message_401201306: But {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Proxy's taste in movies sets me at ease
texts.Option01_401201307: You don't want to ever be too at ease
texts.Message_401201308: The Gravity Cinema on Lumina Square, right?
texts.Message_401201309: I'll head out once I finish the last of my caviar
texts.Message_401201312: Still haven't settled on a destination yet?
texts.Message_401201313: There's a place where I often go to take a break whenever I finish up fieldwork near Lumina Square
texts.Message_401201314: If work has been wearing you out recently, why not come take a stroll with me?
texts.Option02_401201315: I'm worn out every single day
texts.Message_401201316: It's over at Lumina Square. There's a viewing platform beside the river
texts.Message_401201318: Why don't you pick a time and we can meet over at the riverside trail

texts.Message_401800306: Hmm? Anything I can help you with?
texts.Option01_401800307: I just wanted to see you.
texts.Option02_401800307: I was going to ask you out.
texts.Message_401800308: If you had told me that earlier, I'd still be over the moon. Where to?
texts.Option01_401800309: How about I come to Brant Street Construction Site to find you?
texts.Option02_401800309: How about meeting at Bardic Needle?
texts.Message_401800314: Anyway, no backing out. See you at the site.
texts.Message_401800315: I'll let you pick a time.
texts.Message_401800319: The staff there is a beautiful android.
texts.Message_401800320: How do they create that distinctive lazy voice?
texts.Option01_401800322: What are you trying to do...?
texts.Option02_401800322: Are you thinking of taking her apart?
texts.Message_401800325: Would be kind of rude, wouldn't it?
texts.Message_401800327: Let's meet at Bardic Needle. When are you free?
texts.Message_401800328: It's me. Didn't you set a nickname for me?

texts.Message_401800604: I'm fine. It's just that my experiment has hit a bottleneck.

texts.Message_401800617: You're not going to hide Eous away, are you?

texts.Message_401800621: Don't worry. I'm here to see you, and I won't look at any other Bangboo.
texts.Message_401800623: I just can't stand meetings. Why do I have to sit here when they could just email me the minutes?
texts.Message_401800624: Although I wouldn't read them either.
texts.Option01_401800625: Skip the meeting. Let's hang out.
texts.Option02_401800625: Finish the meeting and let's hang out.

texts.Message_400600303: Eâ€”Excuse me... What does Master Proxy want?
texts.Message_400600304: Iâ€”I'm a maid! You seem to be in a really good mood today, Master Proxy.

texts.Message_400600306: Great! I can go anywhere, so why don't you decide!
texts.Option01_400600307: Then let's meet up at the plaza in front of Lumina Galleria.
texts.Option02_400600307: Then let's meet up at Random Play.

texts.Message_400600310: But I didn't pre-register because you need to have two people to make a team...
texts.Option02_400600311: Pick me! Wanna try and win that prize?
texts.Message_400600312: Would you like to go together with me, Master Proxy? That's great!
texts.Message_400600313: It's Ames Special Mechanical Lubricant. Even Lycaon only has eight bottles of it!
texts.Message_400600314: It would be a lot easier to take care of my chainsaw with that.
texts.Message_400600315: But... could I please make an unreasonable request? Iâ€”If we win the challenge...
texts.Option02_400600316: I've got no use for it anyway.
texts.Message_400600317: Thank you, Master Proxy! Could you please pick a time that's good for you?
texts.Message_400600319: Câ€”Can I come into the store?
texts.Message_400600320: Iâ€”I've got a really important thing that I wâ€”want to ask you about... It'll probably take you about an hour...
texts.Option01_400600321: Sure, we're always on the same page Corin!

texts.Message_400600322: Iâ€”I'll fill you in on the details when we meet...
texts.Message_400600323: Seeing as you want to meet at the store too, you can pick the time.
texts.Message_400600324: When the time comes, I'll be waiting for you outside Random Play.

texts.Message_400600508: Ah! Lâ€”Last time, Miss Rina also said...
texts.Message_400600509: "Corin rocks more of that rubble, industrial vibe?"

texts.Message_400600513: It would be really incredible if there were pictures of all the attendants and maids inside that pamphlet.
texts.Message_400600514: And everyone else's photos are so pretty! But... but I'm the only one without a photo...

texts.Message_400600519: So then, when is a good time for you?
texts.Message_400600521: How about the riverside park over by Lumina Galleria?
texts.Message_400600522: Miss Ellen just so happened to gift me this picnic basket which she weaved herself!
texts.Message_400600523: Hmm... Sâ€”Suddenly I feel like going on a picnic together with Master Proxy...

texts.Option01_401400101: Dear attendant, do you have time for me today?
texts.Message_401400102: Please call me Lycaon. Allow me to check today's schedule...
texts.Message_401400103: I had some light work planned for today, but I can take care of it tomorrow.
texts.Message_401400104: For you, I always have time.
texts.Message_401400106: Of course. Have you got any places that you would recommend?
texts.Option01_401400107: How about the open space on the corner of Lumina Square?
texts.Message_401400108: Okay. I have been there before and it's very child-friendly. They have lots of equipment to play with there.
texts.Message_401400109: However, I have heard about an infestation of small mammals over there recently... Mostly stray cats and dogs, things like that.
texts.Message_401400110: We may need to bear this in mind.
texts.Option02_401400111: Do small mammals scare you, Lycaon?
texts.Message_401400112: So long as you like them, I'm happy.
texts.Message_401400113: So, let us meet at the open space on the corner of Lumina Square.
texts.Message_401400116: Of course not. I was just a little worried... But if it's okay with you, then that's fine.
texts.Message_401400118: It seems as though there are a few new movies out at the cinema... Would you like me to pre-book the tickets?
texts.Option01_401400119: Let's just pick once we get there!
texts.Option02_401400119: I'm not sure what I want to watch
texts.Message_401400121: Well then, I shall prepare in advance the refreshments necessary for your viewing pleasure.
texts.Message_401400122: You don't need to bring anything. Just bring yourself.
texts.Option01_401400123: I'll leave it to you, then
texts.Option02_401400123: I can always count on you, Lycaon!
texts.Message_401400124: We should meet up at Gravity Cinema. You can decide the time.
texts.Message_401400125: I'm here. What's the matter? Anything I can do for you?
texts.Option01_401400126: It's cool. I just wanted to hang out with you
texts.Option02_401400126: I just wanna hang out with you.
texts.Message_401400127: I see. I am free all day today
texts.Message_401400128: Is there anywhere you would like to go? Or anything you would like to do?

texts.Message_401400403: Feels like such a waste to stay in on a day like today, so I plan on going out.
texts.Option02_401400404: I'm getting ready to go out, too
texts.Message_401400405: In that case, let us take a stroll together.
texts.Message_401400406: Is there anywhere you want to go in particular?
texts.Option01_401400407: How about going to the riverside trail near Lumina Square?
texts.Option02_401400407: {M#Come hang out at my place}{F#Come over here, then}!
texts.Message_401400408: The riverside trail at Lumina Square? There are usually a lot of tourists.
texts.Message_401400409: It is a popular scenic spot with beautiful views and is a perfect place for walking.
texts.Option02_401400410: Do you like walking there, too?
texts.Message_401400411: Mhm... Actually, I very much enjoy taking walks there.
texts.Message_401400412: So let's meet up at the riverside trail at Lumina Square.
texts.Message_401400413: Let me know what time works best for you.
texts.Message_401400415: Yes, I sometimes walk along the riverside trail. The breeze is very pleasant.
texts.Message_401400416: Do you mean the video store? Of course.
texts.Option01_401400417: It's not just a video store
texts.Option02_401400417: It's the video store but upstairs on the 2nd floor
texts.Message_401400418: I see. I would be delighted to visit if you wouldn't mind.
texts.Message_401400419: Then I shall see you at the video store.
texts.Message_401400420: Please pick a time that is convenient for you.
texts.Message_401400421: Hello. I am making a pot of coffee. I'm about to relax for a while and find something to read.
texts.Option01_401400423: Don't read. Come hang out instead
texts.Option02_401400423: Something has to have gone wrong for me to contact you?
texts.Message_401400424: It would be a pleasure. Is there anywhere you would prefer to go?
texts.Message_401400426: If you have some free time, we could do something together. Is there any place you would like to go?

texts.Message_402100306: A splendid idea! Actually, I was thinking about that place too. They have a lot of dishes I haven't tried yet, so I'm down to explore their menu.
texts.Message_402100307: Then let's meet up at the hot pot restaurant. By the way, can you handle spicy food, dear guide?
texts.Option01_402100308: Yeah, I'm a total spice warrior!

texts.Message_402100309: I see. We'll decide on the spiciness level when we meet up. Feel free to pick the time that works for you.

texts.Message_402100313: I get what you mean. While coffee can be enjoyed anywhere, a coffee shop has that unique atmosphere for a nice chat.

texts.Message_402100316: Perfect! Just let me know the time that works for you.

texts.Message_101700314: What were you just talking about?

texts.Message_101700318: Work can always wait til tomorrow. The Sons of Calydon's not some sweatshop.

texts.Message_101700405: Don't scare me! Iâ€”I'm not scared!
texts.Option01_101700406: Haha all good, I just wanted to hang out.
texts.Option02_101700406: No, I just wanted to ask you to hang out.
texts.Message_101700407: I love going out! Where where?
texts.Option01_101700408: Then let's meet up at Random Play.
texts.Option02_101700408: Let's meet up at the Public Security office.
texts.Message_101700410: Just kidding! I watched some teen rom-coms and always wanted to try that line on someone.
texts.Message_101700411: I'll bring four bottles of Nitro-Fuel. Is that enough?
texts.Message_101700412: If you need more snacks, just DM me.
texts.Message_101700414: A Proxy visiting a PubSec office is like a french fry jumping into the fryer... Or a mouse going to visit a cat.
texts.Option01_101700415: I just need to do some paperwork there.
texts.Option02_101700415: I've just got something that needs doing.
texts.Message_101700416: I've got some paperwork to do, too.
texts.Message_101700417: Hope we'll both get in and out without any trouble~
texts.Message_101700420: Just tell me if there's anything weird.

texts.Option01_42800301: When are you planning a vacation, Piper?
texts.Message_42800303: If I don't have any goods to run, I've got plenty of time to spare...
texts.Option01_42800305: If you're free, how about we hang out?
texts.Option02_42800305: I want to go out. Want to join me, Piper?
texts.Message_42800306: Go out... You youngsters are always full of energy
texts.Option01_42800308: How about a massage to unwind?
texts.OptionLong01_42800308: How about a massage to unwind? I know a great spot at Lumina Square
texts.Option02_42800308: I'd like to watch a movie
texts.OptionLong02_42800308: I'd like to watch a movie at Lumina Square. How's that sound?
texts.Message_42800310: Everything in the city feels so soft and squishy...
texts.Message_42800311: Driving all day leaves my muscles pretty rock-solid...
texts.Option02_42800312: That robot's hands are even more rock-solid...
texts.OptionLong02_42800312: That robot's hands are even more rock-solid... I mean, the shopkeeper's skills are rock-solid!
texts.Message_42800313: Since you put it like that... Okay~
texts.Message_42800315: Why bother spending the money? You run a video store, don't you?
texts.Message_42800316: Why don't you just grab a videotape and hit play?
texts.Message_42800317: Or... do video store managers have to keep up with all the new releases?
texts.Option01_42800318: Yeah, it's all part of the job
texts.Option02_42800318: Not really. I just love watching movies
texts.Message_42800319: I see... I'll keep you company then
texts.Message_42800321: This weather is perfect for taking a nap...
texts.Message_42800322: Just saying the word makes me drowsy...
texts.Message_42800323: Well, I'm off to catch some Z's...

texts.Message_42800403: Like... hitting the jackpot with a scratch card?
texts.Message_42800404: Or is your video store booming today... or your Proxy business is on the up?
texts.OptionLong01_42800405: Neither. It's just I had this dream where I was someone else... I can't recall the details, but it left me feeling happy
texts.OptionLong02_42800405: ...You're on fire, Piper!! You guessed it all! Luck's been on my side since I woke up, everything's going smoothly
texts.Message_42800406: Wish I could borrow some of that luck...
texts.Message_42800407: Already tried my luck with a scratch card... Maybe I'll grab a drink and see if I'll win "Another Bottle"
texts.Message_42800410: Where do you feel like going?
texts.Option01_42800411: Have you been to the coffee shop on Sixth Street?
texts.Option02_42800411: Is there anywhere you want to go?
texts.Message_42800412: The one with a Panda at the entrance?
texts.Message_42800413: I remember passing by it once...
texts.Option01_42800414: I'll treat you to a coffee
texts.Option02_42800414: Tin Master is a pro at making coffee
texts.Message_42800415: Well... I guess we can meet up
texts.Message_42800418: You've got racetracks in the city, right? I'm feeling lucky today...
texts.Option01_42800419: ...If Lucy catches wind of this, I'm toast
texts.Option02_42800419: ...If {F#Wise}{M#Belle} finds out, I'll be in deep trouble
texts.Message_42800421: Alright... There's an arcade in Lumina Square, isn't there?
texts.Message_42800424: What's up? Having a rough day?
texts.Message_42800425: Hey, come on... Don't sweat it...
texts.Message_42800426: A lot of stuff seems trivial in hindsight... No need to stress over things that don't matter
texts.Option01_42800427: How do you stay so chill all the time, Piper?
texts.Option02_42800427: How come you never get anxious, Piper?
texts.Message_42800428: I've been through my fair share...
texts.Message_42800429: Life's short... Stay positive, and you can weather anything
texts.Message_42800430: Do what makes you happy... Wisdom from someone who's seen some stuff
texts.Option01_42800431: Then... Do you want to hang out Piper?
texts.Option02_42800431: So... do you wanna go have some fun, Piper?

texts.Option02_40900404: I want to ask you out
texts.Option01_40900406: Do you want to watch a movie?
texts.Option02_40900406: How about going for some noodles?
texts.Message_40900409: Then let's meet at Lumina Square
texts.Message_40900410: Let's go to the cinema together
texts.Message_40900416: Waterfall Soup on Sixth Street should be more convenient for you

texts.Message_41300527: whatever! when your hungry you gotta eat!

texts.Message_41300602: im cleaning stuff out of the fridge with nagi

texts.Message_41300604: so we had to freeze them all
texts.Message_41300605: ive been eating red bean buns ever since! Theyre tasty

texts.Message_41300609: i was thinking about you, too

texts.Message_41300616: you really love watching movies proxy!

texts.Message_41300625: please~~ i can meet up with you by the elevator!
